songs.title: Closer (Live)
songs.lyrics:
You let me violate you
You let me desecrate you
You let me complicate you
You let me penetrate you

(Ohhhhhhho)

Help me, I torn apart my insides
Help me, got no soul to sell
Help me, the only thing that works for me
Help me, get away from myself

I wanna fuck you like an animal
I wanna feel you from the inside

And I wanna fuck you like an animal
My whole existence is flawed
You bring me closer to God

You can't help my isolation, you can't help the hate it brings

You can't help my absent of faith
You can't help my everything

Help me, turn on my reason
Help me, s** I can smell
Help me, you make me perfect shape
Help me, think I'm somebody else

I wanna fuck you like an animal
I wanna feel you from the inside
I wanna fuck you like an animal

My whole existence is flawed, you bring me closer to God
